title: IBIH Turbo Atkins Diet Soup - Low Carb & Paleo
directions: In a large soup pot, cook the bacon and olive oil over medium heat for 2 minutes.
Add the onions, tomatoes, and mushrooms. Cook for 5 minutes.
Pour in the chicken stock and water, then add the celery root and chicken. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Add the squash, green beans, and greens and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add the red wine vinegar and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Stir in the fresh basil just before serving.
ingredients: 2 cups celery root, peeled and chopped into ½ inch cubes
2 cups yellow squash, sliced and quartered
1 cup green beans, cut into 1 inch pieces
